00027 #ifndef FREENECT_INTERNAL_H
00028 #define FREENECT_INTERNAL_H

00032 #include "libfreenect.h"
00033 
00034 typedef void (*fnusb_iso_cb)(freenect_device *dev, uint8_t *buf, int len);
00035 
00036 #include "usb_libusb10.h"
00037 
00038 struct _freenect_context {
00039         fnusb_ctx usb;
00040 };
00041 
00042 #ifdef FN_BIGENDIAN
00043 static inline uint16_t fn_le16(uint16_t d)
00044 {
00045   return (d<<8) | (d>>8);
00046 }
00047 static inline uint32_t fn_le32(uint32_t d)
00048 {
00049   return (d<<24) | ((d<<8)&0xFF0000) | ((d>>8)&0xFF00) | (d>>24);
00050 }
00051 #else
00052 #define fn_le16(x) (x)
00053 #define fn_le32(x) (x)
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #define DEPTH_RAW_10_BIT_SIZE 384000
00057 #define DEPTH_RAW_11_BIT_SIZE 422400
00058 #define FRAME_H FREENECT_FRAME_H
00059 #define FRAME_W FREENECT_FRAME_W
00060 #define FRAME_PIX FREENECT_FRAME_PIX
00061 
00062 #define DEPTH_PKTSIZE 1760
00063 #define RGB_PKTSIZE 1920
00064 
00065 #define DEPTH_PKTDSIZE (DEPTH_PKTSIZE-12)
00066 #define RGB_PKTDSIZE (RGB_PKTSIZE-12)
00067 
00068 #define DEPTH_PKTS_10_BIT_PER_FRAME ((DEPTH_RAW_10_BIT_SIZE+DEPTH_PKTDSIZE-1)/DEPTH_PKTDSIZE)
00069 #define DEPTH_PKTS_11_BIT_PER_FRAME ((DEPTH_RAW_11_BIT_SIZE+DEPTH_PKTDSIZE-1)/DEPTH_PKTDSIZE)
00070 #define RGB_PKTS_PER_FRAME ((FRAME_PIX+RGB_PKTDSIZE-1)/RGB_PKTDSIZE)
00071 
00072 #define MS_MAGIC_VENDOR 0x45e
00073 #define MS_MAGIC_CAMERA_PRODUCT 0x02ae
00074 #define MS_MAGIC_MOTOR_PRODUCT 0x02b0
00075 
00076 typedef struct {
00077         uint8_t flag;
00078         int synced;
00079         uint8_t seq;
00080         int got_pkts;
00081         int pkt_num;
00082         int pkts_per_frame;
00083         int pkt_size;
00084         int valid_pkts;
00085         uint32_t last_timestamp;
00086         uint32_t timestamp;
00087         uint8_t *buf;
00088 } packet_stream;
00089 
00090 struct _freenect_device {
00091         freenect_context *parent;
00092         void *user_data;
00093 
00094         // Cameras
00095         fnusb_dev usb_cam;
00096         fnusb_isoc_stream depth_isoc;
00097         fnusb_isoc_stream rgb_isoc;
00098 
00099         freenect_depth_cb depth_cb;
00100   freenect_depth_raw_cb depth_raw_cb;
00101         freenect_rgb_cb rgb_cb;
00102         freenect_rgb_format rgb_format;
00103         freenect_depth_format depth_format;
00104 
00105         int cam_inited;
00106 
00107         packet_stream depth_stream;
00108         uint8_t depth_raw[DEPTH_RAW_11_BIT_SIZE];
00109         uint16_t depth_frame[FRAME_PIX];
00110 
00111         packet_stream rgb_stream;
00112         uint8_t rgb_raw[FRAME_PIX];
00113         uint8_t rgb_frame[3*FRAME_PIX];
00114 
00115         // Audio
00116         // Motor
00117         fnusb_dev usb_motor;
00118 
00119 };

00121 struct caminit {
00122         uint16_t command;
00123         uint16_t tag;
00124         int cmdlen;
00125         int replylen;
00126         uint8_t cmddata[1024];
00127         uint8_t replydata[1024];
00128 };
